name: 透
text:
なんかさ、スポーツだと
コーチの言葉とかあるじゃん、こういう時
trans:
There's, like, in sports,
the stuff that coaches say, right? In times like these.

text:
応援してる
それだけだ
trans:
I'll be cheering
you on.
That's all I have.

text:
透は透らしく
やればいい
trans:
You just need
to do it like you,
Toru.

name: 透
text:
……ふふっ
それ、ファンの人みたいだね
trans:
...fufu.
That's kind of like what a fan would say, huh.

name: プロデューサー
trans: (Seems like her nerves loosened up a little.)

name: 透
text:
あー……ありがと
そういうの、わりと難しいよね
trans:
Ahh... thanks.
That's, um, pretty hard to get, isn't it.

name: プロデューサー
text: （うーん、言葉の選択を誤ったか）
trans: (Mmm, maybe I chose the wrong stuff to say.)
